column4: Hi everyone, i've just bought an 8800GT and installed the latest drivers from nvidia, yet i'm having ~2000 fps with glxgears, can someone assist me on this? :)
well it should be around 20.000 fps
If I remember, that card isn't supported yet? (someone confirm or deny?)
and i've sseen people getting 20K fps on several forums
the latest one, or the restricted manager one?
but how can I be suer it's properly loaded compwiz18
i'm out of ideas. maybe they had a different setup then you or something...
mmm i guess... you dont' have that card by any chance compwiz18 ?
I have an ATI card that gets 900fps, so be happy with your 2000 :P
well, I hope you get it working.... I can't help you anymore, sorry :(
I have a final question, could it be that my xorg.conf is incomplete in any way?
